alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Desha; Drew; Grant; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Bradley, Cleveland, Desha, southern Grant, northeastern Calhoun, eastern Dallas, northern Drew, southern Jefferson, Lincoln and south central Arkansas Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 859 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Douglas to near Feenyville to 7 miles west of Carthage. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Warren... Dumas... Fordyce... Star City... Rison... Rohwer... Gould... Wilmar... Grady... Kingsland... Thornton... Mitchellville... Carthage... Tillar... Watson... Winchester... Whitefield... Plantersville... Lucca Landing... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A peak wind gust of 37 mph was recorded at Pine Bluff Airport.

area.areaDesc: Arkansas; Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Desha; Drew; Grant; Jefferson; Lincoln
